DOC.brief_summary: Anthropometric data of infants' face will be obtained using special 3D scanners and software.
DOC.brief_title: Measurements of Facial Dimensions in Infants and Toddlers 0-4 Years of Age
DOC.detailed_description: A digital camera will be used to take a 3D picture the face of each infant. Off line measurements of landmarks on the face will be marked and dimensions will be calculated using a special analysis software.
DOC.criteria: Healthy infants, 04 years of age Facial anomalies
